column1: Contraceptive Method Used* Among Currently Sexually Active, High School Students, by Sex and Type of Method, 2009
Both a Condom and Hormonal Contraceptive**
*Used during last sexual intercourse by student or their partner. **Hormonal contraceptives refers to either birth control pills or Depo-Provera.
Source: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). 1991-2009 High School Youth Risk Behavior Survey Data. Available online: http://apps.nccd.cdc.gov/ youthonline; accessed July 2011.
